# WhatsApp Preview Image - Complete Fix Guide
## Why WhatsApp Isn't Showing Your Logo
WhatsApp uses Facebook's scraper to fetch Open Graph images. If it's not working, it's because:
1. ❌ Images not deployed to production yet 2. ❌ Facebook/WhatsApp cache hasn't been cleared 3. ❌ Images might not be accessible publicly 4. ❌ Need to force Facebook to re-scrape your site
## ✅ STEP-BY-STEP FIX (Do this NOW)
### Step 1: Verify Files Are Ready
Check that these files exist in your `public` folder: - ✅ `favicon.png` (32x32px) - ✅ `apple-touch-icon.png` (180x180px) - ✅ `og-image.png` (1200x630px) ← **This is what WhatsApp uses**
### Step 2: Deploy to Production
```bash # Add all changes git add .
# Commit git commit -m "Add Open Graph images for WhatsApp preview"
# Push to trigger deployment git push ```
If you're using Vercel, it will auto-deploy in 1-2 minutes.
### Step 3: Wait for Deployment
⏱️ Wait 2-3 minutes for: - Build to complete - CDN to propagate - Files to be publicly accessible
### Step 4: Test Image Accessibility
Open this URL in your browser: ``` https://lebonclick.fr/og-image.png ```
You should see your branded preview image. If you get a 404, the deployment didn't complete or files weren't uploaded.
### Step 5: Force Facebook/WhatsApp to Update (CRITICAL!)
**This is the MOST important step!**
1. Go to Facebook's Sharing Debugger: ``` https://developers.facebook.com/tools/debug/ ```
2. Enter your URL: ``` https://lebonclick.fr ```
3. Click **"Debug"** button
4. Click **"Scrape Again"** button (very important!)
5. You should see: - ✅ Your title: "Lebonclick - Votre concierge numérique de confiance" - ✅ Your description - ✅ Your og-image.png preview - ✅ No errors or warnings
6. **This also updates WhatsApp's cache!** Facebook and WhatsApp share the same scraper.
### Step 6: Test in WhatsApp
1. Open WhatsApp (mobile or WhatsApp Web) 2. Send your link to yourself or a friend: ``` https://lebonclick.fr ``` 3. You should see a rich preview card with: - Your branded image (1200x630) - Title: "Lebonclick - Votre concierge numérique de confiance" - Description - Domain: lebonclick.fr
## If WhatsApp STILL Doesn't Show Preview
### Troubleshooting Checklist:
**1. Is the image file accessible?** ```bash # Test in browser https://lebonclick.fr/og-image.png ``` Should display your image, not 404.
**2. Is the image the right size?** - Minimum: 200x200px - Recommended: 1200x630px ✅ (what we created) - Maximum: 8MB file size
**3. Did you scrape with Facebook Debugger?** - WhatsApp won't update without this! - Must click "Scrape Again" to force refresh
**4. Check your HTML source** View page source (Cmd+Option+U) and verify these tags exist: ```html <meta property="og:image" content="https://lebonclick.fr/og-image.png" /> <meta property="og:image:width" content="1200" /> <meta property="og:image:height" content="630" /> ```
**5. Try with query parameter to bypass cache** ``` https://lebonclick.fr?v=2 ``` Then debug this URL in Facebook debugger.
**6. Check image format** WhatsApp supports: - ✅ PNG (what we're using) - ✅ JPG - ❌ SVG (not supported) - ❌ WebP (limited support)
## Alternative: Add Version Number
If cache is really stubborn, rename the image:
1. Rename `og-image.png` to `og-image-v2.png` 2. Update layout.tsx: ```typescript url: 'https://lebonclick.fr/og-image-v2.png' ``` 3. Deploy 4. Force scrape again
## Common Mistakes
❌ **Using relative URLs** → Must use absolute: `https://lebonclick.fr/og-image.png` ❌ **Using SVG files** → WhatsApp doesn't support SVG ❌ **Not clearing Facebook cache** → Must use debugger tool ❌ **Image too small** → Minimum 200x200px ❌ **Wrong MIME type** → Must be image/png or image/jpeg ❌ **HTTPS issues** → Site must be on HTTPS (yours is ✅)
## Quick Test Before Deployment
Test locally: ```bash npm run build npm start ```
Then: 1. Open http://localhost:3000 2. View page source 3. Look for `og:image` meta tag 4. Copy the image URL and paste in browser 5. Verify image loads
## Expected Timeline
- Deploy: 1-2 minutes - CDN propagation: 1-3 minutes - Facebook scrape: Instant (after clicking "Scrape Again") - WhatsApp update: Instant (after Facebook scrape) - **Total time: ~5 minutes**
## Final Verification
After following all steps, your WhatsApp preview should show:
**Preview Card:** - ️ Large branded image (your custom og-image.png) - Title: "Lebonclick - Votre concierge numérique de confiance" - Description: "Service de proximité au Perreux-sur-Marne..." - Link: lebonclick.fr
## Tools You Need
1. **Facebook Sharing Debugger** (Required!): https://developers.facebook.com/tools/debug/
2. **Your deployed site**: https://lebonclick.fr
3. **Image URL to test**: https://lebonclick.fr/og-image.png
## Current Status
✅ Files created locally ✅ Metadata configured correctly ✅ Open Graph implementation compliant ⚠️ Need to DEPLOY ⚠️ Need to SCRAPE with Facebook Debugger
## Next Actions (In Order!)
1. **Deploy now**: `git add . && git commit -m "Add OG images" && git push` 2. **Wait 3 minutes** for deployment 3. **Test image URL**: Open https://lebonclick.fr/og-image.png 4. **Facebook Debugger**: Scrape https://lebonclick.fr 5. **Test WhatsApp**: Send link and verify preview appears
---
**Remember:** WhatsApp will NOT automatically update. You MUST use the Facebook Debugger to force it to fetch the new image!
